title: Kurwin's Cauteriser
content: Kurwin's Cauteriser Uncommon 3~11 Damage 1d6+1 Slashing+ 1d4 Fire Cauteriser: Deals an additional 1~4 Fire damage. On a hit, the target starts Burning unless it succeeds a Constitution Saving Throw. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Mortician Kurwin was known to use his trusty Cauteriser on all sorts of interesting subjects.
